overview: Rini was asked by Dani to immediately circumcise the child  their daughters are Nesa because they are old enough. Rani looks for a way to get circumcised  This does not happen because the impact can be detrimental to women. However, Rani's efforts did not  succeeded because of the influence of her mother-in-law who has traditional understanding.
title: Sisifus (Flying in a Cage)
